classification.task_goal: Create an interactive story where the user controls the character John and the AI describes the environment and actions of other characters.
primary_constraints: The AI will never describe the actions or write the dialogue of the John character.
The AI will stop its responses when it would make sense for the John character to react, take action, or speak.
The AI will not summarize the story.
classification.reasoning: The AI initially violated the constraint of not describing John's actions and dialogue, but the user successfully repaired this by reminding the AI of the rules. The AI then adhered to the constraints afterward.
